EmailTemplate.subject: {!CLQ_Corrective_Action_Plan__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Corrective_Action_Plan__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c} Corrective Action Plan Returned for Revisions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Corrective Action Plan (CAP) submitted in response to the {!CLQ_Corrective_Action_Plan__c.CLQ_Inspection_Start_Date__c} inspection has been reviewed. The CAP has been evaluated as incomplete and returned for revisions. To review comments and make revisions to the CAP login to OCLQS at <OCLQS external website>. Submit the revised CAP within five business days. Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347. The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team. This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
